 • Elizabeth Birch Equality Award . American Airlines received the Elizabet h Birch Equality Award at the 29th annual 
Black Tie Dinner. This award is given by discretion, no mo re than yearly, to an individual, organization, or company 
that has made a significant contri bution of national scope to the ga y, lesbian, bisexual, and transgender 
community.  
• Received a perfect score of 100 percent for the nint h consecutive year on the Human Rights Campaign's 2010 
Corporate Equality Index.  
• American Airlines was named the Cor poration of the Year by four U.S advocacy organizations that champion 
supplier diversity.
